text: 22:3 Aposel 5:34-39; 9:11; 21:39; 26:5; Rom 10:2; 2 Korin 11:22; Galesia 1:14; Filipai 3:5“Kɨ Judan gumazir mam, nan amebam Silisian Distrighɨn, Tarsusɨn nguibamɨn na bate. Ezɨ kɨ Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ikiava aghungi. Kɨ Gamalielɨn dafarimɨn itima, a en ovavibar arazibar nan sure gamizɨ, kɨ bar deravɨra dagh fo. Egha ia datɨrɨghɨn ami moghɨn kɨ Godɨn gɨn mangasa bar gavgafi.
